channel.title: arduino on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in arduino on Joost Plattel

item.title: SOVN
item.description: Sovn (previously known as Jawsaver) creates smart earbuds to stop teeth grinding & clenching. Bruxism is a problem and to solve that I was asked to create several prototypes of mechanics to see what’s the most interesting strategy to develop into a product. All prototypes where supported with a dynamic earbud platform that let’s a user test different mechanics. Arduino’s, micropython, 3D printing and rapid prototyping are things that we’re used in this development proces.

item.title: Making a bluetooth Sudoku keyboard
item.description: My girlfriend loves to solves sudoku’s and most of the time she’s doing so on her iPhone.. As a belated birthday gift I made her a custom sudoku-keyboard with just 9 keys. Who needs more if you just want to do a sudoku right? This was a perfect opportunity for me to dive some more into hardware and especially bluetooth things… The entire body is 3D printed and has threaded inserts with M3 screws and basic keycaps.
